title: Is there ANYTHING planned for a Kennen skin soon, last one was in 2011.
body: Seriously, the only other champs who haven't had skins since 2011 all have excuses. Yorick/Taric will get it with their rework, and Sion got a full model update extreme. Only Kennen is left to bite the dust :'(

replies.body:
Hey Zyvux,

While I can't say if we've got something in development for this guy, I can say that we're aware he's in need of a skin, and more than just a model change. 

If you had your way, what kind of Kennen skin are you looking for?

I know you did not ask me, but I can list some suggestions that might get some ideation going ;)  :

**Sheriff Kennen**
- Tosses sheriff badges
- Turns into a tumbleweed when using Lightning rush
- Electrical Surge makes a whistle noise, akin to that of the title melody of the Good, the Bad and the Ugly
- His ult is now a burning tumbleweed

**Bloodmoon Kennen**
- No explanation needed:
https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/736x/d0/03/52/d00352fcce73e72eed40a5518148d7ca.jpg

**Spectre Kennen**
- Sci-fi themed Kennen with inspiration from StarCraft
http://static4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110220135618/starcraft/images/4/41/Spectre_SC2_Rend1.JPEG

**Alpha Squad Kennen**
- A military themed skin, in the same line as Omega Squad Teemo

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=qUEAtdWu,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-10-14T20:03:36.825+0000)
>
> Hey Zyvux,
> 
> While I can't say if we've got something in development for this guy, I can say that we're aware he's in need of a skin, and more than just a model change. 
> 
> If you had your way, what kind of Kennen skin are you looking for?

Kennen already has a fair share of goofy/parody skins (deadly/swamp master being references to deadpool/yoda, md being goofy), so he could use another badass skin like arctic ops. 

Probably the most requested doable skin for Kennen is Blood Moon, since Shen and Akali already have it. (Pikachu Kennen is the most requested, but there are some clear legal issues with that.) But if I had to decide on which Kennen skin I would want the most, it would definitely be **Storm Lord Kennen**. What it would include is new, storm-like particles (e.g. windy, almost hurricane-like, particles) and a new model that makes him look like a calamity brought upon Runeterra to destroy all in its wake. His ultimate should be changed to look like a hurricane, and wind particles to be added to his other abilities, and maybe even make his E give him a mini tornado around him, which would look even better if he ults, as he would then look like the eye(heart) of the hurricane(tempest).  As for his model, I trust you guys would know how to make it look cool, but if there is anything that should be on it it should be a Chinese straw hat, as a lot of characters associated with thunder and storms usually wear that (e.g. Raiden, Storm Spirit, and many others.) This is definitely the skin I'd want the most for my favorite ninja.

Something similar to this (the left one), but much more omnipotent/otherworldly: http://fluoxyd.deviantart.com/art/Skins-Concept-Kennen-415861966

I think something fire related would be cool for Kennen! He needs some particle changes and if you go by The Last Airbender, stronger forms of fire bending produce lightning! So some fiery effects, but keep the touches of lightning!
